metadata.subject: Louis XVI, King of France, 1754-1793
Account books
metadata.title: Décret de la Convention nationale, du 28 février 1793, l'an second de la République françoise, relatif à l'impression des livres rouges trouvés dans un cabinet secret du ci-devant roi, à Versailles
metadata.creator: France.Convention nationale
France. Convention nationale
Garat, Dominique-Joseph, comte, 1749-1833
Viallanes, François-Ange, printer
metadata.publisher: A Toulouse : Chez Viallanes, imprimeur-libraire, rue Saint-Rome, no. 48
metadata.description: Place of publication and printer statement from colophon
Orders the printing of Louis XVI's "livres rouges," secret registers of expenses not kept on the civil list for espionnage and other secret services
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination.
